index_terms: DEPARTMENT OF SOCIAL AND HEALTH SERVICES
summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Department of Public Health; accepting financial assistance from Washington State for the Child and Youth Project, Maternal and Infant Care Project, and General Maternal and Child Health Program, establishing certain positions and changing expenditure allowances in the 1977 Budget of the Department, making a reimbursable appropriation from the Emergency Fund, and declaring the Emergency therefor.
